name: The Kiss (monochrome_02)
description:
This .gif is part of a series of studies in digital file format databending, dithering, pushing glitching to the extreme. This is the video on which this work is based https://vimeo.com/149025628

Below description of the whole video process listing the glitched file formats + softwarez (mis)used.

Not file were harmed during the making of this video but all of them were data bended and they are:
.avi - .jpg - .jpeg2000 - .bmp - .jpf - .iff - .png - .pdf - .psd - .gif - .tga - .sgi - .xbm - .eps - .pbm - .pcx - .pgm - .pnm - .fit - .dcm - .im1 - .ora - .ppm - .jpe - .rgb |

Tools:
- Audacity
- GoldWave 2
- Vegas Pro 13.0 (64-bit)
- GifCam
- PhotoScape
- XVI32
- Photoshop CS6
- Gimp 2
- MS Paint

Photoshop CS6, Gimp 2 and MS Paint were only used to open and save the file formats, not editing was done using these softwares.

This monochrome version is the second one of the dithering experiment.
